articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 is here: all of the launch news - theverge.com
articles.description: After a long wait filled with leaks, reveals, preorder stress, and hands-on event, the Nintendo Switch 2’s launch has finally arrived.

articles.title: New filament lets you 3D-print parts in authentic 1980s Apple computer color - Ars Technica
articles.description: Mac fan paid $900 to color-match iconic Apple beige-gray “Platinum” plastic for everyone.

articles.title: James Bond game 007 First Light gets first trailer - theverge.com
articles.description: Hitman developer IO Interactive revealed the first look at James Bond game 007 First Light, which launches in 2026.

articles.title: Square Enix surprise announced a Final Fantasy Tactics remaster - theverge.com
articles.description: Square Enix has announced an HD2D remake of Final Fantasy Tactics during PlayStation’s June 2025 State of Play.

articles.title: Here is every PC and Xbox game shown during Sony's PlayStation State of Play June 2025 - Windows Central
articles.description: Here are all the games from the June 2025 PlayStation State of Play that are also coming to Xbox and PC.
